coverage_details.dental_general: Cleaning twice per person per year and root planing included within dental limits
coverage_details.dental_corrective: SR 4,500.00 (Deductible: Nil). Includes crowns (up to SR 1,500) as part of corrective dental limit
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000.00. All types of lenses are covered including multicoated (excluding Contact Lenses)
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Covered - Up to Annual Limit. In-patient rehabilitation (physiotherapy) covered when medically required
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No Pre-authorisation Required - 1,000,000.00. No pre-approval required for VIP members for outpatient & in-patient services (exceptions apply for outpatient limits)
coverage_details.special_instructions: Artificial & Ancillary Limbs, prosthetic devices, physical aids, Free Style Libre, positive airway pressure devices, all therapies (developmental, behavioral/social skills, psychological, occupational, speech), all dental subservices, cataract and functional vision correction, full dermatology coverage, all types of preventive screenings, all vaccinations (seasonal, pandemic, Hajj, Umra, school), herbal and vitamin medication coverage, dietician, allergy, migraine, sleep apnea, sports injuries (except professional), work and non-work related accidents/injuries/motor vehicle accidents covered in full, funeral/burial expenses up to SR 10,000, ambulance, communicable diseases, coverage for maternity and check-ups (including mammography), yearly checkup up to SR 1,000 through select network. Lasik surgeries if not used optical benefit in the policy year. Companion covered up to SR 150.

coverage_details.branded_medication_deductible: Nil (for most providers); 20% up to 200 SR for Sulaiman Al Habib, IMC & Johns Hopkins Aramco Healthcare only
coverage_details.generic_medication_deductible: Nil (for most providers); 20% up to 30 SR for Sulaiman Al Habib, IMC & Johns Hopkins Aramco Healthcare only
coverage_details.dental_general: Cleaning twice per person per year and root planing included within dental limits
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,500.00. All types of lenses are covered including multicoated (excluding Contact Lenses)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Approval limit is SR 3,000.00 for Tier 2. Medication deductible: G: NIL, B: NIL (except for select hospitals as above)
coverage_details.special_instructions: Artificial & Ancillary Limbs, prosthetic devices, physical aids, Free Style Libre, positive airway pressure devices, all therapies (developmental, behavioral/social skills, psychological, occupational, speech), all dental subservices, cataract and functional vision correction, full dermatology coverage, all types of preventive screenings, all vaccinations, herbal and vitamin medication coverage, dietician, allergy, migraine, sleep apnea, sports injuries, work and non-work related accidents/injuries/motor vehicle accidents covered in full, funeral/burial expenses up to SR 10,000, ambulance, communicable diseases, maternity and check-ups (including mammography), yearly checkup up to SR 1,000 through select network, Lasik surgeries (if not used optical usage during policy year), companion up to SR 150.

coverage_details.branded_medication_deductible: 20% up to 200 SR for Sulaiman Al Habib, IMC & Johns Hopkins Aramco Healthcare only; NIL otherwise
coverage_details.generic_medication_deductible: 20% up to 30 SR for Sulaiman Al Habib, IMC & Johns Hopkins Aramco Healthcare only; NIL otherwise
coverage_details.dental_general: Cleaning twice per person per year and root planing included within dental limits
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,500.00. All types of lenses are covered including multicoated (excluding Contact Lenses)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Approval limit is SR 3,000.00 for Tier 2. Medication deductible: G: 20% up to 30SR, B: 20% up to 100 SR for select providers. Medication limit equals pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.special_instructions: All Tier 1 + VIP coverage, with higher annual limit. Lasik surgeries (if not used optical usage during policy year), companion covered up to SR 150. Other conditions mirror Tier 1 and VIP above.
